gr.interamerican.bo2.arch
Interface PersistenceWorkerFactory

public interface PersistenceWorkerFactory

Factory of PersistenceWorker objects. A PersistenceWorkerFactory provides a convenient way to create a PersistenceWorker for a type of PersistentObject.

Method Summary
<M extends PersistentObject<?>>
PersistenceWorker<M>
createPw(java.lang.Class<M> type)
          Creates a PersistenceWorker for a type of PersistentObject.
<M extends PersistentObject<?>>
DetachStrategy
getDetachStrategy(java.lang.Class<M> type)
          Gets the DetachStrategy associated with the persistence worker of the specified type of PersistentObject.
 

Method Detail

createPw

<M extends PersistentObject<?>> PersistenceWorker<M> createPw(java.lang.Class<M> type)
Creates a PersistenceWorker for a type of PersistentObject.

Type Parameters:
M - Type of PersistentObject for which the the PersistenceWorker will be created.
Parameters:
type - The PersistentObject class.
Returns:
Returns an PersistenceWorker for the specified type of PersistentObject.

getDetachStrategy

<M extends PersistentObject<?>> DetachStrategy getDetachStrategy(java.lang.Class<M> type)
Gets the DetachStrategy associated with the persistence worker of the specified type of PersistentObject.

Type Parameters:
M - Type of PersistentObject.
Parameters:
type - Class of PersistentObject.
Returns:
Returns the DetachStrategy for the specified type of persistent object.
